abstract: Attorney for Stephen DiCarmine says emails incriminating his client, former executive director of defunct law firm Dewey & LeBoeuf, are untrustworthy and easily misconstrued; DiCarmine faces accounting fraud charges.
lead_paragraph: A lawyer for Stephen DiCarmine, ex-executive director of defunct law firm Dewey & LeBoeuf, said the grand larceny and fraud case against him was built on email evidence that could be misinterpreted.

headline.main: Lawyer for Ex-Dewey Executive Seeks to Sow Doubt on Evidence Against Him
headline.print_headline: Lawyer for Ex-Dewey Executive Seeks to Sow Doubt on Evidence Against Him

snippet: A lawyer for Stephen DiCarmine, ex-executive director of defunct law firm Dewey & LeBoeuf, said the grand larceny and fraud case against him was built on email evidence that could be misinterpreted.
